snippet.title: The First Berserker: Khazan | Early 2025 Launch Reveal Trailer | Gamescom 2024
snippet.description:
Get ready for the epic journey of The First Berserker: Khazan, launching in early 2025!
🎮 Experience the hardcore action with the hands-on demo at Gamescom – Hall 9.1, Booth B-029
⚔ Sign up for the Technical Closed Beta (Oct 11-20) – https://khazan.nexon.com/
 
The First Berserker: Khazan is a hardcore action RPG based on DNF (Dungeon & Fighter) Universe that will be available on PC Steam, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X/S. As Khazan, the great general of the Pell Los Empire who overcame death, players will unveil the incidents that led to his downfall and seek vengeance on his enemies.
 
✨Learn more about The First Berserker: Khazan✨
Official Website: https://khazan.nexon.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayKhazan
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@PlayKhazan
Discord: https://discord.gg/playkhazan
 
#Thefirstberserkerkhazan #Khazan #singleplayer #hardcoreaction #RPG #APRG #DNF #Dungeonfighteronline  #DNFUniverse #action #steam #xbox #playstation #gameplay #gamescom #gamescom2024
